about-page.phrase-1: HOW TO RECOGNIZE AN ELEWA MEMBER
aboutPageP1: Elewa is a mission-driven organization. We make
use of our cooperative and shared culture to
drive the needle for the development of people
and environment. We care about our growth, but
also care deeply about the context surroundin
aboutPageP2: Our investments are therefore not limited to
internal ones, but contribute heavily to our
community and environment. From training the
next scout leaders on sustainable practices, to
bridging the employment gap for junior software
cultreP: defines us. It protects and guides us to
success. It keeps our team and management accountable to
itself, its objective, and our long-term mission.

p: One for all, all for one! We have a cooperative and open
mindset. If one of us grows, all will follow.
We are dependable and honour our commitments. When
things don't do as planned, as they sometimes do, we
communicate early to avoid catastrophe.
We are a 'Centre of Excellence' as per global standards.
We only compete with ourselves, but find in the global standard our only worthy rival.
We are nothing without people, and people have different
contexts and needs. Our organization acts as a safe haven
and shield for those in need.
Transparency, an open mind, and an open heart hold our organization together.
We commit to and promote full transparency to ourselves, our stakeholders,
and our beneficiaries. We furthermore invest heavily in open-source and open-
data projects, as true pontential lies everywhere. Not just within.

mapP: Based in the heart of Westlands, Nairobi, Kenya, we are easily
accessible from all parts of the city.
Not in town? Teams, Meets or Zoom are our second name. Book an

p: From a Belgian garage and Embakasi apartment,
Elewa first sees the light as a purely SaaS-based
EdTech analyzing KCSE past papers.
With an initial pre-seed investment of friends and
family and a masters thesis on the subject, Elewa
pilots it's innovative 'Four Pillars' model in 5
secondary schools across Kenya. Learning
outcomes go through the roof in only one term.
Successfully piloting in 5 schools, Elewa Education is
ready for the market. Elewa founds Elewa
Investment, a cooperative fund in Belgium aimed at
fueling the growth of Elewa. Elewa lauching four
commercial services across schools in Kenya.
Elewa is recognized by UNESCO as a Kenyan
respentative on top 10 innovations in the
UNESCO ICT in Education Prize (Theme AI &
education). Elewa joins the fourth Cohort of the
'Google for Startups Africa' accelerator program.
Elewa takes a step into the future with Jente
Rosseel as CEO, Kennedy Adhola as HR Director
and Peter Reinartz as chairman. Elewa Education
generalises it's innovative model and finds product
market-fit int the professional training space across
Education, Health and Agriculture & Environment.
iTalanta is born. A tech offshoring company which provides software development services to ../..s
in Europe and the US.
Elewa Education launches first Conversational
learning pilot together with the Kenya Scouts
Association. iTalanta grows to be a major activity
within the company.

component-two.title: How we see it differently
p: The global south is rapidly catching up with the 'developed' world. It's time
for you to get to know the rapid development, innovation and drive going on
in this part of the world(East Africa, South Asia and beyond

component-four.title: Elewa NV, a multi-stakeholder cooperation
component-four.p1: At the heart of Elewa lies the structure Elewa NV. Based in Brussels, Belgium, Elewa NV is a private holding company which controls the assets of all Elewa activities.
component-four.p2: Elewa NV is owned and controlled by Elewa's founder, a small community of investors which share in the vision of Elewa and Elewa employees based throughout the activities of the group.

component-five.title: The Elewa Creative Hub
component-five.p1: Coming soon; The Elewa Creative Hub Lies at the heart of our organization. A two-acre property at the center of Nairobi's creative district, the hub connects all Elewa's Activities under a single banner.
component-five.p2: Through partnerships with creative community, the Elewa Hub will organize vibrant activites that bring talents from different fields (tech, business, art, fashion) together to nurture continuous innovation.

component-six.title: Investing in Elewa NV
component-six.p: From time to time, we offer investment opportunities (private equity & debt) to out community of investors. Interested to take part when this opportunity arrives?

compoenent-seven.title: Become part of our mission.And start investing

component-1.title: Human and Environmental Impact through Social Enterprise

component-3.title: (Social) business for the win
component-3.p: With a young dynamic population that is eager to contribute to the global economy, East Africa has a lot to offer to the world. Now is the time to nurture sustainable, inclusive and scalable business. The rest will take care of itself.

component-4.title: A cooperative mindset
component-4.p: Elewa has one shared objective; To unlock the true potential of individuals, teams, and the community. We believe strongly in the power of sharing ideas and continuously strive to grow each other and ourselves. Internally, but also within the larger communities in which we are active.

component-5.title: Beyond business
component-5.p1: We channel a good amount of our resources into giving back.
component-5.p2: Through projects such as our coding school in Kakuma refugee camp, training teachers in pastoral Samburu and our open-source coding initiatives providing entry-level opportunities to hundreds of junior engineers
component-5.p3: These projects don't necessarily have an immediate financial return, but their impact can be tangibly measured in the long-term.

component-6.title: Open knowledge
component-6.p1: What we learn, we share. Through community events, open knowledge repositories, regular teaching moments (everyone a teacher) and academic partnerships.
component-6.p2: We build for today, with a lens on tomorrow.

component-8.title: Become part of our mission and join elewa.
